title: Asterios Polyp - David Mazzucchelli
description:
This CBZ is mostly based on the already existing scan of Asterios Polyp. However, I have taken the time to clean up the scans (remove page shadows, straighten the artwork etc.)to make it look good on my iPad.

Quality wise this is about as good as it is going to get until somebody does a proper HD-rescan oder a digital edition of the comic book is released.


More Info:



Keep in mind: the scans do the beauty of the real thing no justice. If you like it, buy it, and spread the word!


Please seed, because my connection is really crappy.
